acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU CRAVE DEEP CONNECTIONS BUT HIDE BEHIND YOUR NATURAL SELF CONFIDENCE TO PROTECT YOURSELF...
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU CRAVE DEEP CONNECTIONS BUT HIDE BEHIND YOUR NATURAL SELF CONFIDENCE TO PROTECT YOURSELF...

{FIRSTNAME}, I’m sensing a highly sensitive soul, a true empath, who feels emotions intensely…

You've probably lived your whole life like this, haven’t you?

Thriving on like-minds, meaningful encounters, and truly deep connections, embracing all of life, including the strange, intense, and taboo…

I feel you delight in unearthing new treasures… and something tells me you’re happiest scouring markets for exotic bargains in far flung lands...

You have a strong, loyal, passionate core… but I sense it’s closed off to all but those willing to go deep…

So to some people, you can seem darkly mysterious, like a hidden underground river, full of magical secrets.

To get the absolute best out of yourself, your soul loves to focus... on fine tuning your vision… aiming perfectly at your goals, and designing your world to your taste.

Your reading suggests you make an inspiring, motivating, passionate and confident leader who glides gracefully through even the most difficult of days.

With that said, you’ve always felt that there is more to achieve, that you were born to fulfill an incredibly important mission.

{FIRSTNAME}, I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward that mission now.

And that you have been looking for a sign for quite some time...

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST RELEASE TRAPPED EMOTION…

Your energy is determined and loving, {FIRSTNAME}, with an ability to raise others up.

It makes sense for an empathic soul to accept the dark elements in people... and it’s wonderful how you can perceive all those different points of view... as if you've lived many past lives.

However... your energy reading suggests what you seek the most will only appear when you free up emotions you keep hidden inside.

Maybe you don’t realize it, but... your emotions can consume and direct you…

Deep down you know that the habit of closing yourself off is a barrier to progress. And to doing the important work you were born to do.

It’s incredibly hard to raise your frequency when unresolved issues and emotions from the past are allowed to remain inside... draining your energy, clouding your amazing vision.

I also sense that this is a very critical time on your path, {FIRSTNAME}.

The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

The way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

You naturally embrace life fully, knowing that every end is a new beginning – that brings transformation of the soul.

Releasing darker energy will shine inspiring light into your beautiful depths… strengthening the bonds of connection to yourself, to others, and beyond.

This will enable you to achieve your spiritual and material goals with ease.

Once you set an intention, you always have the goal in your sights, working steadily and quietly toward realizing your dreams.

Are you ready for the next chapter of your life to unfold {FIRSTNAME}?
